jd: Hi,Hope you are doing well,Please find the job description given below and let me know your interest.Position: .Net Developer with Azure PaaS Location: 100% Remote Duration: 6+ Months Job Description: About the jobSeeking .Net Developer with Azure PaaS with 8+ yrs. of experience .Requirements:• Strong experience with MS Azure PaaS• Strong experience with MS ASP.NET and C#• Experience with MS Azure PaaS resources such as: MS Azure SQL, Storage Accounts, Synapse Workspaces, Event Grid Topics, etc.• Experience with CI/CD deployments using Azure DevOps• Experience building Micro services using .Net Technologies• Experience scripting in PowerShell and writing SQL queriesPlease share your updated resume and suggest the best number & time to connect with you.Thanks & Regards,Raveena MouryaUS IT Recruiter, DMS Visions Inc972-452-6160/972-325-9476 | dmsvisions.com/ | raveena@dmsvisions.com4645 Avon Lane, Suite 210, Frisco, TX 75033linkedin.com/in/raveena-mourya-766314250
